CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this formula field to indicate the individual's age.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(MONTH(TODAY()) >= MONTH(Birthdate), DAY(TODAY()) >= DAY(Birthdate)), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Birthdate) + (MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(Birthdate)) / 12, IF(AND(MONTH(TODAY()) < MONTH(Birthdate), DAY(TODAY()) >= DAY(Birthdate)), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Birthdate) - 1 + (12 - MONTH(Birthdate) + MONTH(TODAY())) / 12, IF(AND(MONTH(TODAY()) < MONTH(Birthdate), DAY(TODAY()) < DAY(Birthdate)), (YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Birthdate) - 1) + ((12 - MONTH(Birthdate) + MONTH(TODAY()) - 1)) / 12, IF(AND(MONTH(TODAY()) = MONTH(Birthdate), DAY(TODAY()) < DAY(Birthdate)), (YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Birthdate) - 1) + (11/12), (YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Birthdate)) + (MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(Birthdate) -1) / 12))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates the individual's age.
CustomField.label: Age
